$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlytime/readme.text:
This plugin button displays time with seconds and several time spans when clicked. The tool tip displays todays date minus 78 days. Clicking the time reveals time, time + 15 minutes, time + 30 minutes, and time + 45 minutes.

Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/tiddlytime to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload.

This plugin comprises:

* JavaScript code modules
* Button
* Template
* Stylesheet
* Timestamp
* Caption and hint
